transfer.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens to address `_to`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens from address `_from` to address `_to`.

approve.description: Approves `_spender` to spend `_value` amount of tokens on behalf of the sender.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that `_spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `_owner`.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places for the token.

burn.description: Burns `_value` amount of tokens from the sender's account.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.
